parts.text:
```json
{
"Application": "Bash",
"Software Requirements": [
"Arch Linux",
"Shared functions script (sharedfuncs)",
"Package manager (pacman)",
"Git (for optional downloads)",
"Text editor (e.g., vim, emacs, nano)",
"Curl (for optional downloads)",
"Systemd (for service management)",
"Locale-gen (for locale configuration)",
"Localectl (for setting locale)",
"Useradd (for user creation)",
"Chfn (for user account configuration)",
"Passwd (for setting user passwords)",
"Chown (for setting file permissions)",
"Bash-completion (for bash completion)",
"Pkgstats (for package statistics)",
"Arch-wiki-lite (for Arch Linux wiki access)",
"Zip, unzip, unrar, p7zip, lzop, cpio (for compression/decompression)",
"Avahi (for zeroconf networking)",
"Nss-mdns (for multicast DNS/DNS-SD)",
"Alsa-utils, alsa-plugins (for audio)",
"Pulseaudio, pulseaudio-alsa (for sound server)",
"Ntfs-3g, dosfstools, exfat-utils, f2fs-tools, fuse, fuse-exfat, autofs, mtpfs (for file systems)",
"Sudo (for elevated privileges)",
"Optional AUR helpers (trizen, yay, aurman)",
"Optional desktop environments and window managers (Cinnamon, Deepin, Enlightenment, GNOME, KDE, LXQT, Mate, XFCE, Budgie, Awesome, Fluxbox, i3, Openbox, Xmonad)",
"Optional themes (Arc icon theme, Numix icon theme, Papirus icon theme)",
"Optional display managers (Entrance, GDM, LightDM, SDDM, Slim, LXDM, LXDM-GTK3)",
"Optional applications (Dmenu, Viewnior, Gmrun, Rxvt-unicode, Squeeze, Thunar, Tint2, Volwheel, Xfburn, Xcompmgr, Zathura, Speedtest-cli)",
"Optional graphics applications (Blender, Gimp, Gthumb, Inkscape, Mcomix, Mypaint, Pencil, Scribus, Shotwell, Simple-scan, Yacreader)",
"Optional internet applications (Google Chrome, Chromium, Firefox, Midori, Konqueror, Opera, Vivaldi, Tor browser, Deluge, Dropbox, Flareget, Google Drive OCamlFuse, JDownloader, Qbittorrent, Nitroshare, Resilio Sync, Sparkleshare, Spideroak, Tixati, Transmission, Uget, Youtube-dl, MegaSync, Extreme Download Manager)",
"Optional email and RSS applications (Liferea, Thunderbird)",
"Optional instant messaging and IRC applications (Hexchat, Konversation, Irssi, Pidgin, Skype, Teamspeak3, Viber, Telegram Desktop, Qtox, Discord, Slack, VK Messenger, Zoom)",
"Optional mapping tools (Google Earth, QGIS)",
"Optional VNC and desktop sharing applications (Remmina, Teamviewer)",
"Optional audio applications (Amarok, Audacious, Clementine, Deadbeef, Guayadeque, Musique, Pragha, Rhythmbox, Spotify, Timidity++, Quodlibet, Audacity, Easytag, Ocenaudio, Soundconverter, Soundkonverter)",
"Optional video applications (Gnome-mplayer, Livestreamer, Minitube, MPV, SMPlayer, Parole, Plex Media Server, Popcorntime, VLC, Kodi, Arista, Avidemux, Filebot, Handbrake, Kdenlive, Lightworks, Openshot, Pitivi, Transmageddon)",
"Optional games (Desura, PlayOnLinux, Steam, Minecraft)",
"Optional web server components (Apache, MariaDB, PostgreSQL, Nginx, PHP, PHP-FPM, Adminer)",
"Optional fonts (DejaVu, Fira Code, Google Fonts, Liberation, Bitstream Vera, Hack, Mac Fonts, MS Fonts, Wqy Microhei, Noto Fonts CJK, Nerd Fonts)",
"Optional IME input tools (FCITX, Ibus)",
"Optional extra tools (Profile-sync-daemon)",
"Optional system tools (ClamAV, Cockpit, Webmin, Docker, Firewalld, GParted, Grsync, Hosts-update, Htop, Gotop, UFW, Unified Remote, VirtualBox, Wine, Netdata, Nload, VMware Workstation)",
"Optional system configuration tools (Systemd-timesyncd, TLP)",
"Optional kernel modules (vboxguest, vboxsf, vboxvideo, radeon, amdgpu, nouveau, intel, vesa)",
"Optional kernel headers (for kernel module compilation)",
"Optional language packs (e.g., kde-l10n-pt_BR, libreoffice-fresh-pt_BR, thunderbird-i18n-pt-BR)"
],
"Resource Requirements": [
"Internet connection (for package downloads)",
"Sufficient disk space for package installations",
"Root privileges (for system-wide changes)"
]
}
```
